languages.text: {n}Преисполнившись отваги, воины Вольного Торговца бросились в бой, словно их повелитель{mf||ница} был{mf||а} подле них. Забыв о ранах, усталости и понесенных потерях они сражались с учетверенной силой и истребили всех духов — и синих, и лиловых.{/n}

{n}Filled with courage, the Rogue Trader's warriors charged forth as if their sovereign was at their side. Their wounds, exhaustion, and losses forgotten, they each fought with the strength of four soldiers and exterminated the spirits, both blue and purple alike.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Преисполнившись отваги, воины Вольного Торговца бросились в бой, словно их повелитель{mf||ница} был{mf||а} подле них. Забыв о ранах, усталости и понесенных потерях они сражались с учетверенной силой и истребили всех духов — и синих, и лиловых.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Filled with courage, the Rogue Trader's warriors charged forth as if their sovereign was at their side. Their wounds, exhaustion, and losses forgotten, they fought with the strength of four soldiers each and exterminated the spirits, both blue and purple alike.{/n}

{n}Filled with courage, the Rogue Trader's warriors charged forth as if their sovereign was at their side. Their wounds, exhaustion, and losses forgotten, they each fought with the strength of four soldiers and exterminated the spirits, both blue and purple alike.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行商浪人的战士们满怀勇气，向前冲锋，仿佛他们的君主就在他们身边。他们忘记了创伤、疲惫与减员，每个人在战斗中都展现出以一敌十的力量，最终将蓝色幽灵和紫色幽灵全都消灭了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Filled with courage, the Rogue Trader's warriors charged forth as if their sovereign was at their side. Their wounds, exhaustion, and losses forgotten, they each fought with the strength of four soldiers and exterminated the spirits, both blue and purple alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行商浪人的战士们满怀勇气，向前冲锋，仿佛他们的君主就在他们身边。他们忘记了创伤、疲惫与减员，每个人在战斗中都展现出以一敌十的力量，最终将蓝色幽灵和紫色幽灵全都消灭了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Llenos de valor, los guerreros {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente cargaron como si su gobernante estuviera a su lado. Olvidadas las heridas, el cansancio y las pérdidas, cada uno de ellos luchó con la fuerza de cuatro soldados y exterminó a los espíritus, tanto azules como púrpuras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Filled with courage, the Rogue Trader's warriors charged forth as if their sovereign was at their side. Their wounds, exhaustion, and losses forgotten, they each fought with the strength of four soldiers and exterminated the spirits, both blue and purple alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Llenos de valor, los guerreros {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente cargaron como si su gobernante estuviera a su lado. Olvidadas las heridas, el cansancio y las pérdidas, cada uno de ellos luchó con la fuerza de cuatro soldados y exterminó a los espíritus, tanto azules como púrpuras.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ローグトレーダーの戦士たちは勇気を奮い立たせ、君主がそばにいるかのごとく突進した。負った傷も、疲労も、敗れたことも忘れ、戦士はそれぞれ4人分の兵士の力で戦い、青も紫もどちらの精霊も根絶した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Filled with courage, the Rogue Trader's warriors charged forth as if their sovereign was at their side. Their wounds, exhaustion, and losses forgotten, they each fought with the strength of four soldiers and exterminated the spirits, both blue and purple alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ローグトレーダーの戦士たちは勇気を奮い立たせ、君主がそばにいるかのごとく突進した。負った傷も、疲労も、敗れたことも忘れ、戦士はそれぞれ4人分の兵士の力で戦い、青も紫もどちらの精霊も根絶した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cœur empli de courage, les guerriers {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} partent au combat comme si leur {mf|souverain|souveraine} marchait à leurs côtés. Oubliant leurs blessures, la fatigue et les camarades tombés au combat, ils luttent avec une force démultipliée et exterminent tous les esprits, bleus comme mauves.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Filled with courage, the Rogue Trader's warriors charged forth as if their sovereign was at their side. Their wounds, exhaustion, and losses forgotten, they each fought with the strength of four soldiers and exterminated the spirits, both blue and purple alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cœur empli de courage, les guerriers {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} partent au combat comme si leur {mf|souverain|souveraine} marchait à leurs côtés. Oubliant leurs blessures, la fatigue et les camarades tombés au combat, ils luttent avec une force démultipliée et exterminent tous les esprits, bleus comme mauves.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Von Mut erfüllt stürmten die Krieger {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} vorwärts, mit {mf|ihrem Herrscher|ihrer Herrscherin} an der Seite. Ihre Wunden, ihre Erschöpfung und ihre Verluste waren vergessen. Jeder Einzelne kämpfte mit der Kraft von vier Soldaten und löschte Geister aus, blaue und violette gleichermaßen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Filled with courage, the Rogue Trader's warriors charged forth as if their sovereign was at their side. Their wounds, exhaustion, and losses forgotten, they each fought with the strength of four soldiers and exterminated the spirits, both blue and purple alike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Von Mut erfüllt stürmten die Krieger {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} vorwärts, mit {mf|ihrem Herrscher|ihrer Herrscherin} an der Seite. Ihre Wunden, ihre Erschöpfung und ihre Verluste waren vergessen. Jeder Einzelne kämpfte mit der Kraft von vier Soldaten und löschte Geister aus, blaue und violette gleichermaßen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hür Tacir'in yürekleri cesaretle dolan savaşçıları, hükümdarlarıyla omuz omuza hücuma geçtiler. Yaralarını, bitkinlikleri ve verdikleri kayıpları akıllarından silen askerler, dört asker gücünde savaşarak hem mavi hem de mor ruhları ayırt etmeksizin ortadan kaldırdılar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Filled with courage, the Rogue Trader's warriors charged forth as if their sovereign was at their side. Their wounds, exhaustion, and losses forgotten, they each fought with the strength of four soldiers and exterminated the spirits, both blue and purple alike.{/n}
